title: Mordekaiser's eventual VU wishlist
body:
So Riot has said that {{champion:82}} 's VU is on the horizon, so let's post what we would like to see in it.

My personal wishlist:

What I think should stay
1. Same design, like Garen, Nasus, and Master Yi's VUs. Mordekaiser has always been my favorite champion design. He's a Shadow Isle champion, but doesn't really have that generic spooky ghost look. I really like his "dark knight" look, and hope it stays that way.
2. Same Voice actor. I love his current Voice actor, I think it's perfect for him.
3. His sarcastic+evil personality.
4. No overly filtered voice, please! Can't even understand what champions like Thresh are saying half the time.
5. You only need to click once, fool! (his joke maybe?)

What I think should change
1. His ult DoT animation. It's just a spinning Mordekaiser head floating above people. Looks silly.
2. His lack of movement when doing pretty much anything. Kind of boring to watch.
3. His death animation. He just explodes, lol. While I do like this animation, it makes him seem more like a joke character. Maybe this should be his pentakill skin death animation.
4. Dragon knight and Infernal skins. They're pretty much chromas atm.
5. His skins to use different weapons. Would be awesome to see him use a great sword or something in a skin, since it attacks pretty much the same as a mace.
6. Lore expansion. There isn't really any lore about his past.
7. More lines.(obviously)
8. Removal of his lame lines. ("No pain, no drain.", "This whole... living thing is... highly overrated.", etc.)

How would you like to see his VU handled?

replies.body: Well, I would love to hear him having more lines. He seems to lack character and I hope Adam Harrington adds them because he is the bomb.
